response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. Given its exceptional value and quality, we believe it would be a perfect fit for your needs and expectations. We understand its immense worth to you stands at $1,200,000. Keeping this in mind, we are offering you the chance to own it at a special price of $950,000. This is an excellent opportunity to secure a high-quality asset at a competitive price. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. We look forward to your positive consideration.", "product_price": 950000}
